segments.text: May I come in , Mr Sun ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d rather you didn ’ t , Miss Yang . I ’ m very busy now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it all right for me to come in now , Mr Sun ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , uh ... I ’ m still pretty busy , but ... all right . Come in . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you mind if I sit down ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . Take a seat . Now what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to leave the department . Do you think I could put info a transfer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . But why should you want to do that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you mind if I speak frankly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . You see , I don ’ t like the office . I don ’ t like the staff . And I ’ m afraid of you . And I don ’ t want to go one . So may I put info a transfer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I ’ d be delighted if you did .
segments.speaker: S2
